# ambientPressure

**Type Property**

A sensor that provides pressure and temperature metrics.

## Declaration

```swift
static let ambientPressure: SRSensor
```

## Discussion

The [doc://com.apple.sensorkit/documentation/SensorKit/SRFetchResult/sample] type for this sensor is `[`[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreMotion/CMRecordedPressureData]`]`.

You need to provide a reason to record ambient pressure by adding the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/BundleResources/Information-Property-List/NSSensorKitUsageDetail/SRSensorUsageElevation] dictionary to the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/BundleResources/Information-Property-List/NSSensorKitUsageDetail] key in the information property list.

## Reading environment sensors

- **ambientLightSensor**: A sensor that provides ambient light information.
